page.title: 16BOXTED INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content:
MAXSTORE.
The Estate has been in existence for 10 years. As the demand for apples fell, Mr Sexton decided to build on his land. He built factories,then they were hired to companies. There are 20 factory units and between them they employ about 100 people. The manager is Mr Garnet, he looks after the rates and office work. He has lived in Langham for 17 years and has worked at the Boxted Industrial Estate for 3 years. He needs to travel to Ipswich, Colchester, Chelmsford and London in connection with the Estate. The units house small businesses which includes, a transport company, a wholesale greengrocer, a micro circuit board manufacturer and a printers.
